title: Every Time you die do Push up / Sit up Challenge!
body:
For people who are interested in losing weight / getting good but feed and need motivation not to die i have a motivational technique :D (Credit I stole of my best mate IGN: Zoa)

Every time you die, for the amount of seconds you die do sit ups or push ups (choice is up to you) If you want to be even cheekier you can wait after game and calculate amount of deaths, or when you're in Queue do it till you find a game

I did it for a while it made me try not to die or feed. After a while you sort of get too much into the game but probs try it in norms. If you're stuck inside all day playing league and haven't moved for a while it will help.

Challenge you guys to take it on! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
